name: Venture Arctic
description: The second entry in the Pocketwatch Games back-catalog, Venture Arctic is an “Interactive Nature Documentary”. Caribou and Wolves roam the tundra while Polar Bears and Orcas patrol the icy seas. The player must harness the forces of sun, snow, and wind to create balance in these fragile ecosystems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
